titleInfo.title: "Intruder in the Dust" Cast Members and Unidentified Others

mods.abstract: "Intruder in the Dust" cast members and unidentified others (possibly local dignitaries who visited while "Intruder" was shooting on location in Nashville, Tennessee). The movie is set in rural Mississippi during the 1940s and features Juano Hernandez as Lucas Beauchamp, a black man with a reputation for standing up to whites. When Beauchamp is found standing over a white man's dead body, he is immediately jailed. He insists that he is innocent and asks the town's most prominent lawyer, Gavin Stevens (David Brian), to defend him, but Stevens refuses. The situation changes, however, when a local boy named Chick Mallison (Claude Jarman Jr.) who Beauchamp has helped in the past hears talk of an impending lynching and begs Stevens to change his mind.
